id.description: A unique string identifying this comment.

is_reply_comment.description: Whether or not this comment is a reply to another comment.

message.description: The comment text that the user typed.

tagged_message.description: The string representing the comment text with @mentions included.

created_by.description: A mini user object representing the author of the comment.

dcreated_at.description: The time this comment was created.

item.description: The object this comment was placed on.

modified_at.description: The time this comment was last modified.
